title: Sunsets at Pier 60
post_excerpt: There’s nothing quite like a sunset on Florida’s west coast. All summer long, head up to Clearwater beach for “Sunsets at Pier 60.”...
post_content: <p>There’s nothing quite like a sunset on Florida’s west coast. All summer long, head up to Clearwater beach for “Sunsets at Pier 60.”  A true tradition, each night, a collection of crafts, live entertainment and goodies can be found from 6 – 9 p.m. <g class="gr_ gr_10 gr-alert gr_spell gr_inline_cards gr_run_anim ContextualSpelling ins-del" id="10" data-gr-id="10">as</g> the local community comes together to celebrate another day in paradise. Jugglers, magicians and street performers, including fire eaters and stilt walkers, add to the evening’s festivities. This family-friendly event is complimentary, making it the perfect destination to watch that big red ball sink into the water. A number of restaurants surround the area, so grab a bite and then settle in for one of nature’s most spectacular shows.  Or, make it an all-day affair and set up camp on the beach for sun, surf and sand in the daytime hours and get a front-row seat before the official celebration begins. Get all of the “sun”-<g class="gr_ gr_11 gr-alert gr_spell gr_inline_cards gr_run_anim ContextualSpelling" id="11" data-gr-id="11">sational</g> details <a href="https://www.visitstpeteclearwater.com/profile/sunsets-pier-60/1987">here</a>.</p>
